name: Grapple (itch) (TheOfficialTylerTran)
description:
Test your skills with this grapple rod. Grapple this, grapple that, grapple everywhere. This difficulty chart game helps you build your skills. At the end, there will be a test with one of each difficulty stage combined together. Sequel might come out if I want to build. Good Luck!

BTW this is my first game :)
